body: {"success": false, "error": "MediaConvert processing failed: An error occurred (BadRequestException) when calling the CreateJob operation: You specified an invalid type for 'settings.outputGroups.[0].outputs.[0].captionDescriptions.[0].destinationSettings.burninDestinationSettings.alignment'. Replace the value with a BurninSubtitleAlignment (Valid values: 'CENTERED', 'LEFT', 'AUTO'), or remove 'settings.outputGroups.[0].outputs.[0].captionDescriptions.[0].destinationSettings.burninDestinationSettings.alignment' (if optional), then resubmit your request. For more information, see the MediaConvert API reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/mediaconvert/latest/apireference/resources.html"}
